blurb: Nix is a dynamically typed, functional DSL for the Nix package manager.

key_features.title: Purely Functional
key_features.content: Nix is a purely functional language, with no side effects.

key_features.title: Lazy
key_features.content: Expressions are only evaluated when they are needed.

key_features.title: Dynamic
key_features.content: Nix's dynamic typing supports powerful metaprogramming.

key_features.title: Familiar
key_features.content: Nix's syntax is similar to JSON, which makes it easy to read and write.

key_features.title: Simple
key_features.content: There is a small set of core features.

key_features.title: Community-Supported
key_features.content: Nix is developed by a diverse community
